text: Vijay Kanakamedala is an Indian film director and screenwriter who works in Telugu films. He best known for his films Naandhi and Ugram. ==Career== Vijay hailing from Bhadrachalam, completed his B.Sc. in Computer Science. He then pursued film studies at a Film Institute Hyderabad and worked as an assistant to the director K. Balachander. Later he worked as a assistant director for Harish Shankar in the films Mirapakay, Gabbar Singh and DJ: Duvvada Jagannadham. In 2021, he made his directorial debut with Naandhi, featuring Allari Naresh and Varalaxmi Sarathkumar, which got him praises from critics. Sangeetha Devi of The Hindu described "Naandhi marks as a confident directorial debut for Vijay Kanakamedala", In 2023, Vijay once again collaborated with Allari Naresh for the film Ugram received mixed reviews from critics. In 2025, he directed Bhairavam the official remake of tamil film Garudan starring Bellamkonda Sreenivas, Manchu Manoj and Nara Rohith. == Filmography == Year Title Cast Notes Ref. 2021 Naandhi Allari Naresh, Varalakshmi Sarath Kumar Directorial debut 2023 Ugram Allari Naresh, Mirnaa Menon 2025 Bhairavam Bellamkonda Sreenivas, Manchu Manoj, Nara Rohith == Awards and nominations == Award Category Work Result Sakshi Excellence Awards Jury Special Recognisition Award Naandhi 20th Santosham Film Awards Santosham EVV Smaraka Award SIIMA Awards Best Debut Director â€“ Telugu == References == == External links == *
title: Vijay Kanakamedala
